channel.title: Can't run server
channel.description:
Every time I try to run the server I get this: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal<Unknown Source> [/code]
lol??? :confused: :confused: :confused: If anybody could help that would be great and I will love you forever.
Sorry if this is a dumb question, but I'm new to this and this section is for questions is it not?

item.title: Can't run server
item.dc:creator: @Get_Ic3d Get Ic3d
item.description:
@Get_Ic3d wrote:

Ok, I literally downloaded a server source and change the compiler and runserver to what it said in the tutorial in the rs2 server tutorial section. I’ll try it with a different source and tell you my outcome. Thank you for the quick response :).[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2008, 03:45:49 pm[/size][hr]Ok, I tried it with about 5 different sources and get the exact same output for every source. Help please![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2008, 05:04:37 pm[/size][hr]Ugghhhh anybody? I’m willing to try any ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run server
item.dc:creator: @nigelthechamp nigelthechamp
item.description:
@nigelthechamp wrote:

it means you added something somewhere, where your’re not supposed to.
